messages.subject: Re: Influences - correction
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry, that should have read Dr. Raymond Moore, not Robert. Mary Ellen The darn trouble with cleaning the house is it gets dirty the next day anyway, so skip a
messages.messageBody:
Sorry, that should have read Dr. Raymond Moore, not Robert.
Mary Ellen
The darn trouble with cleaning the house is it gets dirty the next day
anyway,
so skip a week if you have to. The children are the most important
thing.
--Barbara Bush
